#summary How to use jSCEP in your own application.
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Introduction =

This page describes how to use jSCEP in your own application.

= Details =

== Dependencies ==

jSCEP depends on the "Provider" and "SMIME/CMS" libraries from the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/ Bouncy Castle] project, both of which should be added to your project classpath.  Both libraries can be found on the [http://www.bouncycastle.org/latest_releases.html Bouncy Castle Latest Releases] page.

== Using jSCEP ==

Using jSCEP is *easy*.  Simply download the [http://code.google.com/p/jscep/downloads/list?q=label:Featured%20type=Library the latest release] of jSCEP, and add it to your class path alongside the libraries obtained from the Bouncy Castle project.
